taskbridge.reminders.controller.sync

taskbridge.reminders.controller.sync(caldav_url, username, password, headers, to_sync)

Carries out the reminder synchronisation process.

Parameters:

  • caldav_url (str) – URL to the CalDav endpoint for this user.

  • username (str) – username for CalDav.

  • password (str) – password for CalDav.

  • headers (dict) – any headers to send to the CalDav server.

  • to_sync (List[str]) – list of reminder lists or task calendars which should be synchronised.
